alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Burlington; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Burlington County through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lumberton, or 17 miles south of Trenton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Medford, Lumberton, Mount Holly, Presidential Lakes Estates, Pemberton, Wrightstown, Presidential Lakes, Jobstown, Leisuretowne, Browns Mills, Medford Lakes, Pemberton Heights and Fort Dix. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
